channel.title: Selenium installation on Selenium 문서
channel.description: Recent content in Selenium installation on Selenium 문서

item.title: Installing Selenium libraries
item.description: Page being translated from English to Korean. Do you speak Korean? Help us to translate it by sending us pull requests! First you need to install the Selenium bindings for your automation project. The installation process for libraries depends on the language you choose to use. Java Installation of Selenium libraries for Java can be done using Maven. Add the selenium-java dependency in your project pom.xml: <dependency> <groupId>org.

item.title: 웹드라이버 바이너리 설치
item.description: 당신의 프로젝트와 브라우저 제어를 시작하기 위해서 특정 브라우저의 웹드라이버 바이너리가 설치돼있어야 합니다. 당신의 브라우저가 지원하는 웹드라이버 바이너리 를 다운로드하고, 시스템 경로에 위치하세요.

item.title: Installing Standalone server
item.description: Page being translated from English to Korean. Do you speak Korean? Help us to translate it by sending us pull requests! If you plan to use Grid then you should download the selenium-server-standalone JAR file. All the components are available via selenium-server. The standalone JAR contains everything, including the remote Selenium server and the client-side bindings. This means that if you use the selenium-server-standalone jar in your project, you do not have to add selenium-java or a browser specific jar.
